layer at (0,0) size 800x600
  LayoutView at (0,0) size 800x600
layer at (0,0) size 800x600
  LayoutBlockFlow {HTML} at (0,0) size 800x600
    LayoutBlockFlow {BODY} at (8,8) size 784x584
layer at (8,8) size 34x48
  LayoutBlockFlow (positioned) {DIV} at (8,8) size 34x48 [border: (2px solid #0000FF)]
    LayoutBlockFlow {DIV} at (2,2) size 30x24 [border: (2px solid #FFA500)]
      LayoutText {#text} at (2,2) size 26x19
        text run at (2,2) width 26: "One"
    LayoutBlockFlow (floating) {DIV} at (2,26) size 26.89x20
      LayoutText {#text} at (0,0) size 27x19
        text run at (0,0) width 27: "Two"
